title: Active Lifestyles Reporter - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Active Lifestyles Reporter Posted/Updated: 10-26-2015 Brief Job Description: This reporter will focus on stories about Michiganders on the go, including recreational/individual sports such as running, cycling, kayaking, hiking, rock climbing, yoga, etc...
